content: NEW YORK  June 16 Cash  people and equipment are pouring into the prolific Permian shale basin in Texas as business booms in the largest U.S. oilfield. But one group of investors is heading the other way - concerned that shale may become a victim of its own success.
name: Diamondback Energy Inc
title: Funds pull back from Permian as U.S. shale oil firms go into overdrive

content: Oil and gas producer Diamondback Energy Inc  said on Wednesday it would pay $2.43 billion to buy acreage in Texas' Permian Basin  adding to a string of deals in the prolific shale field.
name: Diamondback Energy Inc
title: Diamondback to expand in Permian with $2.43 billion acreage buy
